channel.title: Revenge
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Revenge" - I'm stuck on the Revenge quest.

item.title: Re: Revenge
item.content:encoded: You could also fight arena battles and get the +1 gen success item (Letter of Marque works, too).

item.title: Re: Revenge
item.content:encoded: You could, alternatively, get the plug suit drop from whichever kaiju. And the last 1 success you need to pray for, you've forgotten the letter of marque.

item.title: Re: Revenge
item.content:encoded:
Actually, all of those allies are disabled during Revenge so, no, they don't.

Most people, if they're just shy on the required Range, use the Welcome to Good Burger jutsu for an extra boost.

Those that do have enough range to get at least 1 success via rolling use their Sword Call jutsu and pray for the last 2 successes.

item.title: Re: Revenge
item.content:encoded: must people either use a timmy lvl 2 team or a shorty 2 and mister six team. their 2 success bonus helps out

item.title: Revenge
item.content:encoded: When i do the quest i get stuck on the Hunt down Haus. Every jutsu i use doesn't seem to work. When ever i use a jutsu with +# success, i get that much out of 4 and the + success jutsus only go as high as + 3. How do i get the 4/4?
